titleStmt.title: An impartial relation of John Kelly's services in the Victualling-Office With an account of the great abuses he has met with from his opposers. Likewise his necessary vindication occasioned by their report to the Lords of the Admiralty.
titleStmt.author: Kelly, John, biscuit-baker.
England and Wales. Royal Navy. Victualling Office. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author, who is an advocate for the sailors,
